comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Miss Katherine Force, sister of Madeleine Astor (a Titanic survivor), married in 1922 to Lorillard Spencer (nephew of William Spencer, a Titanic victim). www.encyclopedia-titanica.org/miss-katherine-force-wed-ma... Here's Katherine's sister Madeleine Force Astor: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2969697028/]

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for all of the information and for noting the date on the negative.  We'll add the date to the description when we update it.

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: Additional research shows that this image is a copy of a larger photo titled "The Misses Force" that includes Katherine and her sister Madeleine.  You can see part of Madeleine's elaborate gown on the lower right.  The photograph of Katherine and her sister was submitted for copyright on March 13, 1911 so it was made before that date.  The July 1913 date may indicate when the copy negative was created or possibly when the image was used.

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Is the original version in your collections anywhere by any chance?

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: Lú:  The original was acquired by the Library of Congress when it was submitted for copyright by the Campbell Studios of New York City on March 13, 1911.  The copyright submission indicates that the photograph was taken on March 11, 1911.  We haven't scanned the photograph so it isn't available on line yet.  The call number for the photograph, held in the Prints and Photographs Division is BIOG - Force, Misses.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Her sister was: Madeleine Force Astor (June 19, 1893 – March 27, 1940) was the wife of millionaire John Jacob Astor IV and the wealthiest woman on board the RMS Titanic. She was born on June 19, 1893 in Brooklyn, New York to William Hurlbut Force and Katherine Arvilla Talmage. She had a sister, Katherine Emmons Force. She first met John Jacob Astor IV, one of the richest men in the United States, in Bar Harbor, Maine while she was still in school. On September 9, 1911 the eighteen-year-old Madeleine married the forty-seven year old John Jacob Astor in Beechwood, the Astor family's Newport, Rhode Island home. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madeleine_Astor
